values: Tag-to-effects system tag definitions - SINGLE SOURCE OF TRUTH
All functional tags and their behaviors are defined here
Can be equipped in mainHand OR offHand
Jack of all trades class - balanced versatility
Master crafter class - crafting speed and quality
Hits all targets in straight line
Chaotic damage, random type each hit
Hits all targets in frontal cone
Physical impact damage, bonus vs armor
Heavy armor - high defense, low mobility
Light armor - low defense, high mobility
Physical piercing damage, ignores some armor
Mobile gatherer class - speed, ranged, nature
Cloth armor - lowest defense, magic bonuses
Loot hunter class - luck, rare drops, gathering
Magical researcher class - mana, alchemy, arcane
Return damage to attacker (alias for reflect)
Heal percentage of damage dealt (alias for lifesteal)
Frontline fighter class - high HP, melee damage

metadata.description: Tag-to-effects system tag definitions - SINGLE SOURCE OF TRUTH
metadata.note: All functional tags and their behaviors are defined here

1H.description: Can be equipped in mainHand OR offHand

adventurer.description: Jack of all trades class - balanced versatility

artisan.description: Master crafter class - crafting speed and quality

beam.description: Hits all targets in straight line

chaos.description: Chaotic damage, random type each hit

cone.description: Hits all targets in frontal cone

crushing.description: Physical impact damage, bonus vs armor

heavy.description: Heavy armor - high defense, low mobility

light.description: Light armor - low defense, high mobility

piercing.description: Physical piercing damage, ignores some armor

ranger.description: Mobile gatherer class - speed, ranged, nature

robes.description: Cloth armor - lowest defense, magic bonuses

scavenger.description: Loot hunter class - luck, rare drops, gathering

scholar.description: Magical researcher class - mana, alchemy, arcane

thorns.description: Return damage to attacker (alias for reflect)

vampiric.description: Heal percentage of damage dealt (alias for lifesteal)

warrior.description: Frontline fighter class - high HP, melee damage
